thread.title: Data I/O Announces New Distribution Partnership With iNETest Technologies India
thread.title_full: Data I/O Announces New Distribution Partnership With iNETest Technologies India

author: admin
title: Data I/O Announces New Distribution Partnership With iNETest Technologies India
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Data I/O Corporation 
REDMOND, WA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/21/15 -- Data I/O Corporation (NASDAQ: DAIO), the leading provider of manual and automated device programming solutions, announced the company completed a distribution agreement with iNETest Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. for representation of Data I/O In India. 
iNETest Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. has established itself with a reputable name in the SMT (Surface Mount Technology) Industry and has gained trust from many companies as a provider of a full PCBA (Printed Circuit Board Assembly) Solution, with specialization in PCB Test & Inspection Business. iNETest Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. is well positioned to represent Data I/O in India's growing market. 
"Data I/O is excited to expand its presence in the region by working with iNETest Technologies India," states Mr. Nick Deppen, Sales Director, Data I/O Corporation. "iNETest is well respected by its customers and has a demonstrated ability to grow markets for electronics manufacturing equipment." 
"We are very excited to be part of DATA IO family," states Mr. Soni Saran Singh, Managing Director of iNETest Technologies India Pvt. Ltd. "We are convinced Data I/O and iNETest have the correct synergy and direction based on our companies' approach of customers' satisfaction and production enrichment for our customers and theirs." 
Additional company information is available at http://www.inetest.co.in/ 
About Data I/O Since 1972 Data I/O has developed innovative solutions to enable the design and manufacture of electronic products for automotive, medical, wireless, consumer electronics, industrial controls and military/aerospace markets. Today, our customers manufacture tens of millions of products each year using Data I/O programming solutions to reliably, securely, and cost-effectively deliver their Intellectual Property into programmable devices. Data I/O provides programming solutions for devices in any package, whether programmed in a socket or on a circuit board. Our expertise in programmable integrated circuits, global supply chain processes, and IP management and protection helps bring innovative new products to life. These solutions are backed by a global network of Data I/O support and service providers, ensuring success for our customers. Contact:
